theorem kronecker_map_diagonal_diagonal [Zero α] [Zero β] [Zero γ] [DecidableEq m] [DecidableEq n] (f : α → β → γ)
    (hf₁ : ∀ b, f 0 b = 0) (hf₂ : ∀ a, f a 0 = 0) (a : m → α) (b : n → β) :
    kronecker_map f (diagonal a) (diagonal b) = diagonal fun mn => f (a mn.1) (b mn.2) :=
  by
  ext (⟨i₁, i₂⟩⟨j₁, j₂⟩)
  simp [diagonal, apply_ite f, ite_and, ite_apply, apply_ite (f (a i₁)), hf₁, hf₂]

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/-- `matrix.kronecker_map_bilinear` commutes with `⬝` if `f` commutes with `*`.

This is primarily used with `R = ℕ` to prove `matrix.mul_kronecker_mul`. -/
theorem kronecker_map_bilinear_mul_mul [CommSemiring R] [Fintype m] [Fintype m'] [NonUnitalNonAssocSemiring α]
    [NonUnitalNonAssocSemiring β] [NonUnitalNonAssocSemiring γ] [Module R α] [Module R β] [Module R γ]
    (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » α R («expr →ₗ[ ] » β R γ)) (h_comm : ∀ a b a' b', f (a * b) (a' * b') = f a a' * f b b')
    (A : Matrix l m α) (B : Matrix m n α) (A' : Matrix l' m' β) (B' : Matrix m' n' β) :
    kronecker_map_bilinear f (matrix.mul A B) (matrix.mul A' B') =
      matrix.mul (kronecker_map_bilinear f A A') (kronecker_map_bilinear f B B') :=
  by
  ext (⟨i, i'⟩⟨j, j'⟩)
  simp only [kronecker_map_bilinear_apply_apply, mul_apply, ← Finset.univ_product_univ, Finset.sum_product,
    kronecker_map_apply]
  simp_rw [f.map_sum, LinearMap.sum_apply, LinearMap.map_sum, h_comm]
#align kronecker_map_bilinear_mul_mul kronecker_map_bilinear_mul_mul
kronecker_map_assoc₁:
theorem kronecker_map_assoc₁ {δ ξ ω : Type _} (f : α → β → γ) (g : γ → δ → ω) (f' : α → ξ → ω) (g' : β → δ → ξ)
    (A : Matrix l m α) (B : Matrix n p β) (D : Matrix q r δ) (h : ∀ a b d, g (f a b) d = f' a (g' b d)) :
    reindex (Equiv.prodAssoc l n q) (Equiv.prodAssoc m p r) (kronecker_map g (kronecker_map f A B) D) =
      kronecker_map f' A (kronecker_map g' B D) :=
  ext fun i j => h _ _ _
#align kronecker_map_assoc₁ kronecker_map_assoc₁
kronecker_map_assoc:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃ » -/
theorem kronecker_map_assoc {δ ξ ω ω' : Type _} (f : α → β → γ) (g : γ → δ → ω) (f' : α → ξ → ω') (g' : β → δ → ξ)
    (A : Matrix l m α) (B : Matrix n p β) (D : Matrix q r δ) (φ : «expr ≃ » ω ω')
    (hφ : ∀ a b d, φ (g (f a b) d) = f' a (g' b d)) :
    (reindex (Equiv.prodAssoc l n q) (Equiv.prodAssoc m p r)).trans (Equiv.mapMatrix φ)
        (kronecker_map g (kronecker_map f A B) D) =
      kronecker_map f' A (kronecker_map g' B D) :=
  ext fun i j => hφ _ _ _
#align kronecker_map_assoc kronecker_map_assoc
kronecker_map_apply:

-- TODO: set as an equation lemma for `kronecker_map`, see mathlib4#3024
@[simp]
theorem kronecker_map_apply (f : α → β → γ) (A : Matrix l m α) (B : Matrix n p β) (i j) :
    kronecker_map f A B i j = f (A i.1 j.1) (B i.2 j.2) :=
  rfl
#align kronecker_map_apply kronecker_map_apply
kronecker_map_add_right:
theorem kronecker_map_add_right [Add β] [Add γ] (f : α → β → γ) (hf : ∀ a b₁ b₂, f a (b₁ + b₂) = f a b₁ + f a b₂)
    (A : Matrix l m α) (B₁ B₂ : Matrix n p β) :
    kronecker_map f A (B₁ + B₂) = kronecker_map f A B₁ + kronecker_map f A B₂ :=
  ext fun i j => hf _ _ _
#align kronecker_map_add_right kronecker_map_add_right
kronecker_map_add_left:
theorem kronecker_map_add_left [Add α] [Add γ] (f : α → β → γ) (hf : ∀ a₁ a₂ b, f (a₁ + a₂) b = f a₁ b + f a₂ b)
    (A₁ A₂ : Matrix l m α) (B : Matrix n p β) :
    kronecker_map f (A₁ + A₂) B = kronecker_map f A₁ B + kronecker_map f A₂ B :=
  ext fun i j => hf _ _ _
#align kronecker_map_add_left kronecker_map_add_left

theorem kronecker_diagonal [MulZeroClass α] [DecidableEq n] (A : Matrix l m α) (b : n → α) :
    matrix.kronecker_map.mul A (diagonal b) = blockDiagonal fun i => «expr • » (MulOpposite.op (b i)) A :=
  kronecker_map_diagonal_right _ MulZeroClass.mul_zero _ _
#align kronecker_diagonal kronecker_diagonal
kronecker_assoc:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
@[simp]
theorem kronecker_assoc [Semigroup α] (A : Matrix l m α) (B : Matrix n p α) (C : Matrix q r α) :
    reindex (Equiv.prodAssoc l n q) (Equiv.prodAssoc m p r)
        (matrix.kronecker_map.mul (matrix.kronecker_map.mul A B) C) =
      matrix.kronecker_map.mul A (matrix.kronecker_map.mul B C) :=
  kronecker_map_assoc₁ _ _ _ _ A B C mul_assoc
#align kronecker_assoc kronecker_assoc
kronecker_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
@[simp]
theorem kronecker_apply [Mul α] (A : Matrix l m α) (B : Matrix n p α) (i₁ i₂ j₁ j₂) :
    (matrix.kronecker_map.mul A B) (i₁, i₂) (j₁, j₂) = A i₁ j₁ * B i₂ j₂ :=
  rfl
#align kronecker_apply kronecker_apply
kronecker_add:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
theorem kronecker_add [Distrib α] (A : Matrix l m α) (B₁ B₂ : Matrix n p α) :
    matrix.kronecker_map.mul A (B₁ + B₂) = matrix.kronecker_map.mul A B₁ + matrix.kronecker_map.mul A B₂ :=
  kronecker_map_add_right _ mul_add _ _ _
#align kronecker_add kronecker_add
inv_kronecker:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
theorem inv_kronecker [Fintype m] [Fintype n] [DecidableEq m] [DecidableEq n] [CommRing R] (A : Matrix m m R)
    (B : Matrix n n R) : (matrix.kronecker_map.mul A B)⁻¹ = matrix.kronecker_map.mul A⁻¹ B⁻¹ :=
  by
  -- handle the special cases where either matrix is not invertible
  by_cases hA : IsUnit A.det;
  swap
  · cases isEmpty_or_nonempty n
    · exact subsingleton.elim _ _
    have hAB : ¬IsUnit (matrix.kronecker_map.mul A B).det :=
      by
      refine' mt (fun hAB => _) hA
      rw [det_kronecker] at hAB
      exact (isUnit_pow_iff Fintype.card_ne_zero).mp (isUnit_of_mul_isUnit_left hAB)
    rw [nonsing_inv_apply_not_is_unit _ hA, zero_kronecker, nonsing_inv_apply_not_is_unit _ hAB]
  by_cases hB : IsUnit B.det; swap
  · cases isEmpty_or_nonempty m
    · exact subsingleton.elim _ _
    have hAB : ¬IsUnit (matrix.kronecker_map.mul A B).det :=
      by
      refine' mt (fun hAB => _) hB
      rw [det_kronecker] at hAB
      exact (isUnit_pow_iff Fintype.card_ne_zero).mp (isUnit_of_mul_isUnit_right hAB)
    rw [nonsing_inv_apply_not_is_unit _ hB, kronecker_zero, nonsing_inv_apply_not_is_unit _ hAB]
  -- otherwise follows trivially from `mul_kronecker_mul`
  · apply inv_eq_right_inv
    rw [← mul_kronecker_mul, ← one_kronecker_one, mul_nonsing_inv _ hA, mul_nonsing_inv _ hB]
#align inv_kronecker inv_kronecker
diagonal_kronecker_tmul_diagonal:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
theorem diagonal_kronecker_tmul_diagonal [DecidableEq m] [DecidableEq n] (a : m → α) (b : n → α) :
    matrix.kronecker_map.tmul' (diagonal a) R (diagonal b) = diagonal fun mn => «expr ⊗ₜ » (a mn.1) (b mn.2) :=
  kronecker_map_diagonal_diagonal _ (zero_tmul _) (tmul_zero _) _ _
#align diagonal_kronecker_tmul_diagonal diagonal_kronecker_tmul_diagonal
diagonal_kronecker_tmul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.tmul' -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » -/
theorem diagonal_kronecker_tmul [DecidableEq l] (a : l → α) (B : Matrix m n α) :
    matrix.kronecker_map.tmul' (diagonal a) R B =
      Matrix.reindex (Equiv.prodComm _ _) (Equiv.prodComm _ _)
        (blockDiagonal fun i => B.map fun b => «expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » (a i) R b) :=
  kronecker_map_diagonal_left _ (zero_tmul _) _ _
#align diagonal_kronecker_tmul diagonal_kronecker_tmul
diagonal_kronecker_diagonal:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
theorem diagonal_kronecker_diagonal [MulZeroClass α] [DecidableEq m] [DecidableEq n] (a : m → α) (b : n → α) :
    matrix.kronecker_map.mul (diagonal a) (diagonal b) = diagonal fun mn => a mn.1 * b mn.2 :=
  kronecker_map_diagonal_diagonal _ MulZeroClass.zero_mul MulZeroClass.mul_zero _ _
#align diagonal_kronecker_diagonal diagonal_kronecker_diagonal

theorem diagonal_kronecker [MulZeroClass α] [DecidableEq l] (a : l → α) (B : Matrix m n α) :
    matrix.kronecker_map.mul (diagonal a) B =
      Matrix.reindex (Equiv.prodComm _ _) (Equiv.prodComm _ _) (blockDiagonal fun i => «expr • » (a i) B) :=
  kronecker_map_diagonal_left _ MulZeroClass.zero_mul _ _

det_kronecker_tmul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.tmul' -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » -/
theorem det_kronecker_tmul [Fintype m] [Fintype n] [DecidableEq m] [DecidableEq n] (A : Matrix m m α)
    (B : Matrix n n β) :
    det (matrix.kronecker_map.tmul' A R B) = «expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » (det A ^ Fintype.card n) R (det B ^ Fintype.card m) :=
  by
  refine' (det_kronecker_map_bilinear (TensorProduct.mk R α β) tmul_mul_tmul _ _).trans _
  simp (config := { eta := false }) only [mk_apply, ← include_left_apply, ← include_right_apply]
  simp only [← alg_hom.map_matrix_apply, ← AlgHom.map_det]
  simp only [include_left_apply, include_right_apply, tmul_pow, tmul_mul_tmul, one_pow, _root_.mul_one, _root_.one_mul]
#align det_kronecker_tmul det_kronecker_tmul
det_kronecker_map_bilinear:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/-- `determinant` of `matrix.kronecker_map_bilinear`.

This is primarily used with `R = ℕ` to prove `matrix.det_kronecker`. -/
theorem det_kronecker_map_bilinear [CommSemiring R] [Fintype m] [Fintype n] [DecidableEq m] [DecidableEq n] [CommRing α]
    [CommRing β] [CommRing γ] [Module R α] [Module R β] [Module R γ] (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » α R («expr →ₗ[ ] » β R γ))
    (h_comm : ∀ a b a' b', f (a * b) (a' * b') = f a a' * f b b') (A : Matrix m m α) (B : Matrix n n β) :
    det (kronecker_map_bilinear f A B) =
      det (A.map fun a => f a 1) ^ Fintype.card n * det (B.map fun b => f 1 b) ^ Fintype.card m :=
  calc
    det (kronecker_map_bilinear f A B) =
        det (matrix.mul (kronecker_map_bilinear f A 1) (kronecker_map_bilinear f 1 B)) :=
      by rw [← kronecker_map_bilinear_mul_mul f h_comm, Matrix.mul_one, Matrix.one_mul]
    _ = det (blockDiagonal fun _ => A.map fun a => f a 1) * det (blockDiagonal fun _ => B.map fun b => f 1 b) :=
      by
      rw [det_mul, ← diagonal_one, ← diagonal_one, kronecker_map_bilinear_apply_apply,
        kronecker_map_diagonal_right _ fun _ => _, kronecker_map_bilinear_apply_apply,
        kronecker_map_diagonal_left _ fun _ => _, det_reindex_self]
      · exact LinearMap.map_zero₂ _ _
      · exact map_zero _
    _ = _ := by simp_rw [det_block_diagonal, Finset.prod_const, Finset.card_univ]
    
#align det_kronecker_map_bilinear det_kronecker_map_bilinear
det_kronecker:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
theorem det_kronecker [Fintype m] [Fintype n] [DecidableEq m] [DecidableEq n] [CommRing R] (A : Matrix m m R)
    (B : Matrix n n R) : det (matrix.kronecker_map.mul A B) = det A ^ Fintype.card n * det B ^ Fintype.card m :=
  by
  refine' (det_kronecker_map_bilinear (Algebra.lmul ℕ R).to_linear_map mul_mul_mul_comm _ _).trans _
  congr 3
  · ext (i j)
    exact mul_one _
  · ext (i j)
    exact one_mul _
#align det_kronecker det_kronecker

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.tmul' -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.tmul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.tmul -/
theorem add_kronecker_tmul (A₁ A₂ : Matrix l m α) (B : Matrix n p α) :
    matrix.kronecker_map.tmul' (A₁ + A₂) R B = matrix.kronecker_map.tmul A₁ B + matrix.kronecker_map.tmul A₂ B :=
  kronecker_map_add_left _ add_tmul _ _ _
#align add_kronecker_tmul add_kronecker_tmul

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.kronecker_map.mul -/
theorem add_kronecker [Distrib α] (A₁ A₂ : Matrix l m α) (B : Matrix n p α) :
    matrix.kronecker_map.mul (A₁ + A₂) B = matrix.kronecker_map.mul A₁ B + matrix.kronecker_map.mul A₂ B :=
  kronecker_map_add_left _ add_mul _ _ _
#align add_kronecker add_kronecker
